alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Houston; Macon; Peach; Taylor; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Macon, southwestern Twiggs, Peach, Houston, southeastern Crawford and east central Taylor Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Garden Valley to Marshallville to Moss Oak to Grovania, and moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Marshallville, Reynolds, Robins Air Force Base, Hayneville, Nakomis, Meadowdale, Houston Lake, Grove Park, Powerville, Moss Oak, Miami Valley, Kathleen, Saint Louis, Sand Bed and Grovania. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Houston; Macon; Peach; Taylor; Twiggs
